title: Antietam National Battlefield: Portrait Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery     Portrait Gallery                Portrait Gallery      Here is a collection of portraits, primarily Union and Confederate soldiers that were at the Battle of Antietam. Each image has been digitally enhanced to improve the quality of the photograph.  Â                 Confederate Soldiers   7 Photos  Confederate Soldiers who were at Antietam          Union Soldiers   20 Photos  Union Soldiers
